items.name: GRADE 3 ENGLISH WILLOW BAT - OMEGA
items.description: THE OMEGA 2022 RANGE OFFERS IMMACULATE BALANCE AND AN ALL-INCLUSIVE HITTING AREA. THE OMEGA STRIKES A PERFECT EQUILIBRIUM OF PERFORMANCE AND VALUE FOR MONEY. CRAFTED FROM SELECTED GRADE 3 ENGLISH WILLOW, OMEGA OFFERS GREAT AESTHETICS FOR ITS BUDGET AND UNMATCHED PERFORMANCE.

items.name: GRADE 2 ENGLISH WILLOW BAT - VERTEX
items.description: THE VERTEX 2022 RANGE IS MADE OUT OF HAND-SELECTED GRADE 2 ENGLISH WILLOW. THE SHAPE IS CAREFULLY HANDCRAFTED TO GIVE GREATER BAT SPEED. THE SWELL OF THE BAT IS SIGNIFICANTLY IMPROVED EMPHASIZING THE FORCE, DELIVERING MASSIVE BATS WITH LIGHT PICK-UPS.

items.name: GRADE 5 ENGLISH WILLOW BAT - STELLER
items.description: THE STELLER RANGE OF BATS FEATURES AN ENHANCED DUCK-BILL PROFILE. EACH BAT COMES WITH A TOE GUARD FITTED, ALONG WITH A FIBRE SHEET/ GRAIN SHEET TO ENHANCE THE AESTHETICS OF THE BAT. PREFERRED AND IDEAL FOR ENTRY-LEVEL PLAYERS TRANSITIONING TO AN ENGLISH WILLOW BAT.

items.name: BALLS - VERVE RED
items.description: ENTIRELY HAND-STITCHED WITH A HIGH-QUALITY CORK CENTRE,PREMIUM LACQUER WITH A MATTE FINISH,DESIGNED FOR A GUARANTEED MINIMUM 50 OVER INNINGS,SUITABLE FOR LEAGUE AND PROFESSIONAL USE,SOLD AS A BOX OF SIX

items.name: BATTING PADS - WHITE
items.description: A2 CRICKET BATTING PADS ARE MADE OF DURABLE, LIGHTWEIGHT, BREATHABLE MATERIALS. THESE BATTING LEG GUARDS ARE DESIGNED TO FIT SECURELY AROUND THE LEG WITH ADJUSTABLE STRAPS. THESE CRICKET LEG GUARDS ARE RECOMMENDED FOR PROFESSIONAL CRICKETERS. THESE BATTING PADS OFFER EXCELLENT PROTECTION FOR YOUR SHINS AND KNEES.

THESE CRICKET LEG GUARDS ARE RECOMMENDED FOR PROFESSIONAL CRICKETERS. THESE BATTING PADS OFFER EXCELLENT PROTECTION FOR YOUR SHINS AND KNEES.

items.description: THE VERVE COMBO THIGH PAD OFFERS CLASS-LEADING COMFORT, PROTECTION AND VERSATILITY FOR YOUR THIGHS. THE PRIMARY THIGH GUARD CAN BE USED SEPARATELY

items.name: KIT BAG - VERVE XL
items.description: VERVE XL KITBAG WITH ITS STAND UP FEATURE, LARGE COMPARTMENTS AND REFINED DETAILING IS DESIGNED TO PROVIDE INDUSTRY-STANDARD KIT STORAGE OPTIONS WHILST BEING COMPACT ENOUGH FOR CLUB USE. APPROXIMATE DIMENSIONS FOR THE VERVE XL: 100CM X 40CM X 40CM

items.name: VERVE DUFFLE KIT BAG - LE RED LIVERY
items.description: THE KITBAG DUFFLE COMES WITH DEDICATED COMPARTMENTS BUILT FOR EASY ACCESS TO ALL YOUR CRICKET GEAR. IT IS SPACIOUS YET COMPACT – LARGE ENOUGH TO CARRY ALL YOUR MATCH DAY KIT. APPROXIMATE DIMENSIONS FOR THE DUFFLE: 90CM X 40 CM X 40 CM.
